previous.excerpt:
I started investing right when I turned 18 in the summer of 2020. I'm talking
index funds and ETFs, the boring but good stuff. Ended 2020 with a 34% return
thanks to the raging bull market which made me pour even more money into it. I
bought into the GME hype at $34 dollars but eventually dca'd my…
